comments:
I installed Platform SDK 3.2RC4 and then all the Callisto RC3 components via the Callisto Discover Site. When I start up Eclipse, the following five errors appear in the Error Log view for each startup.

NLS missing message: UI_CONTROLS_PENDING_NAME in: org.eclipse.hyades.statistical.ui.messages
NLS missing message: AGENT_NULL_EXCEPTION in: org.eclipse.hyades,statistical.ui.messages
NLS missing message: BUNDLE_LOCATION in: org.eclipse.hyades.statistical.ui.messages
NLS missing message: BUNDLE_ID in: org.eclipse.hyades.statistical.ui.messages
NLS missing message: BUNDLE in: org.eclipse.hyades.statistical.ui.messages

Additionally, each time I switch to the (empty) Test and Profiling Perspective, I get the following error in the Error Log view:
